name: Where is Mr Spock
description:
Hello everyone !

As a good Trekkie (absolute Star Trek fan), I always regretted that there was not enough game to extend this beautiful universe. I embarked on a series of small amateur games, visual novel, platform ...

I am not a professional and I do this in my free time, I ask you to be forgiving if there are any bugs or errors. Do not hesitate to point them out to me.

This first game is in development (there is no independent save system other than Checkpoint, but if you quit, you start over). The version I'm sending you was done in four days. I work alone, the sets as well as the animations took a lot of my time.

I am delighted to share this adventure with you.
